details.formulaStrippedArticleTitle: Modulation effect and inverse synthetic aperture radar imaging of rotationally symmetric ballistic targets with precession
details.title: Modulation effect and inverse synthetic aperture radar imaging of rotationally symmetric ballistic targets with precession
details.standardTitle: Modulation effect and inverse synthetic aperture radar imaging of rotationally symmetric ballistic targets with precession
details.abstract: The modulation effect of rotationally symmetric ballistic targets (BTs) with precession is concerned. To further approach the actual case, the modulation in amplitude and Doppler is considered in the radar backscattering and revealed by short-time Fourier transform (STFT). The results indicate that the micro-Doppler (m-D) effect induced by periodical precession is not represented as a sinusoidal modulation on the edge of BTs as usual, and the amplitude modulation may lead to discontinuity of time-frequency curve. The phenomenon in STFT is confirmed by both simulated and real data from a BT model with precession measured in the microwave anechoic chamber. Based upon the measured data, inverse synthetic aperture radar imaging results have been obtained by smoothed pseudo Wigner-Ville time-frequency distribution.

ieee.displayText: Xiao-yi Pan, Qi-xiang Fu, Zhao-yu Gu, Yong-cai Liu, Wei Wang, "Micro-Doppler period estimation from ballistic targets with precession", Military Communications and Information Systems (ICMCIS) 2016 International Conference on, pp. 1-6, 2016.
ieee.title: Micro-Doppler period estimation from ballistic targets with precession

ieee.displayText: Kun-Yi Guo, Quan-You Qu, Ai-Xi Feng, Xin-Qing Sheng, "Miss Distance Estimation Based on Scattering Center Model Using Time-Frequency Analysis", Antennas and Wireless Propagation Letters IEEE, vol. 15, pp. 1012-1015, 2016, ISSN 1536-1225.
ieee.title: Miss Distance Estimation Based on Scattering Center Model Using Time-Frequency Analysis

ieee.displayText: Xiao-Yi Pan, Wei Wang, De-Jun Feng, Yong-Cai Liu, Guo-Yu Wang, "Signature Extraction From Rotating Targets Based on a Fraction of HRRPs", Antennas and Propagation IEEE Transactions on, vol. 63, pp. 585-592, 2015, ISSN 0018-926X.
ieee.title: Signature Extraction From Rotating Targets Based on a Fraction of HRRPs

ieee.displayText: Wenpeng Zhang, Kangle Li, Weidong Jiang, "Parameter Estimation of Radar Targets with Macro-Motion and Micro-Motion Based on Circular Correlation Coefficients", Signal Processing Letters IEEE, vol. 22, pp. 633-637, 2015, ISSN 1070-9908.
ieee.title: Parameter Estimation of Radar Targets with Macro-Motion and Micro-Motion Based on Circular Correlation Coefficients
